mapper.select: select tm.message_id, tm.message, tm.room_id, tm.user_id, mu.name, tm.state, to_char(tm.create_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as create_at, to_char(tm.update_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as update_at from t_talk_messages tm Left outer join m_user mu on tm.user_id = mu.user_id where tm.state = 0 and tm.room_id = #{roomId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_talk_messages( message, room_id, user_id, state, create_at, update_at ) values ( #{message}, #{roomId}, #{userId}, 0, now(), now() )
